versions.name: AWS WAF Rule or Rule Group Deletion v101.0.0
versions.description: Identifies the deletion of a specified AWS Web Application Firewall (WAF) rule or rule group.
author: Elastic
false_positives: WAF rules or rule groups may be deleted by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Rule deletions by unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
versions.query: event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:(waf.amazonaws.com or waf-regional.amazonaws.com or wafv2.amazonaws.com) and event.action:(DeleteRule or DeleteRuleGroup) and event.outcome:success
versions.setup: The AWS Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
